comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: Where I live, the brickwork on a house of this age would be red with yellow-brick for the "highlight" brickwork. What are the brickwork colours typically there?

comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: Thanks, Nicole! It does look like a similar Scottish influence, if what I'm told about those brickwork patterns here (I'm in southern Ontario, Canada) is accurate. Oh! And while I'm here ... Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Architecture, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
